Class XMLFormatV2

  • java.lang.Object

                 CommandDecorator decorator,
                 CommandDecorator head)
        Load a slide item (e.g. text, image or action)
        Parameters:
        slide - The item will be added to this slide item
        item - XML element will be converted into a slide item or an slide command
        decorator - The action which is coupled on a slide item. Can be null
        head - The first action of the slide. Can be null
